original_text: So Moses went out and told the people the words of the Lord. And he gathered seventy men of the elders of the people and placed them around the tent.
korean_text: 모세가 나가서 여호와의 말씀을 백성에게 알리고 백성의 장로 칠십 인을 모아 장막에 둘러 세우매

sentences.original_text: and told the people the words of the Lord.
And he gathered seventy men of the elders of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 백성의 장로 칠십 명을 모으고

sentences.original_text: and placed them around the tent.
